Class ComplexOrder

java.lang.Object
  ComplexOrder

public class ComplexOrder
extends java.lang.Object

Class representing the decision to make a move/attack on a planet. Contains the target, the number of ships required and the time at which the attack should commence.

Method Summary
 boolean fastMove(PlanetWars pw)
          Tries to issue the order to the game engine so that the estimated time to arrival is at least as requested by the order.

 void strictMove(PlanetWars pw)

Method Detail

protect

public static void protect(PlanetWars pw,
                           java.util.List<ComplexOrder> l)
Calls the fastMove method on all elements of the list. Required to defend multiple planets.

strike

public static void strike(PlanetWars pw,
                          java.util.List<ComplexOrder> l)
Calls the strictMove method on all elements of the list. Required in attacks where the prediction engine needs precision.

strictMove

public void strictMove(PlanetWars pw)
Tries to issue the order to the game engine so that the estimated time to arrival is exactly as requested by the order, not a turn earlier. Required for cheap stealing neutral planets from the opponent.

fastMove

public boolean fastMove(PlanetWars pw)
Tries to issue the order to the game engine so that the estimated time to arrival is at least as requested by the order. Searches for source planets containing the required amount of troops.
